entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Roblin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:22 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Roblin 12:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -27.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -31.5°C
Wind: NW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Local blowing snow near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 35 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
